div.ab: To Ptolemaios, village clerk of the village of Bacchias, from Thaesis, daughter of Psenatymis, son of Aunes, and of the mother Thaesis, from the abovementioned village of Bacchias, with her guardian, the relative Apollonios, son of Apollonios. Aunes, my brother of the same father and mother, registered in the same village of Bacchias, of no profession, died in the month of Mecheir, in the present 14th year of Antoninus Caesar our Lord. I therefore request that he be entered in the registry of those who have died.;(2. hand) I, Ptolemaios, village clerk, received this through the scribe Ptolemaios.;(1. hand?) Year 14, Mecheir
